original_text: ‘Accept these gifts from the leaders. Give them to the Levites. All the Levites can use them for their work at the Tent of Meeting.’
korean_text: 그것을 그들에게서 받아 레위인에게 주어 각기 직임대로 회막 봉사에 쓰게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: Accept these gifts from the leaders.
All the Levites can use them
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 레위 사람들은 그것들을 사용할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: for their work at the Tent of Meeting.
